channel.title: Hi, I'm Matt, programmer and soon to be author of a book on prototyping and user testing
channel.description:
Hey guys,
I'm a programmer by trade who is very interested in fine tuning products before they are built. My background is in human computer interaction and I stumbled upon this fantastic forum through friendly word of mouth.
Here's a post I think you might find useful if you are doing user testing right now: [One Question to Rule Them All - Getting Honest User Feedback][1]
In addition, I'm hoping to interview a few bootstrappers / entrepreneur hopefuls to help nail down my book's landing page. If you are interested I would be eternally grateful and can offer you a $10 amazon egift card.
Best of luck!
[1]: http://mattsencenbaugh.com/one-question-to-rule-them-all-getting-honest-user-feedback/

item.title: Hi, I'm Matt, programmer and soon to be author of a book on prototyping and user testing
item.dc:creator: Clay_Nichols
item.description:
Welcome.

I’m happy to spend 10 or 15 m looking at your landing page.

PM me.

-Clay

Read full topic
